channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Going once, going twice: Google’s millisecond ad auctions are the focus of monopoly claim
item.description: An ongoing trial may determine whether Google holds an illegal monopoly on the technology used to buy and sell certain types of advertising on web pages.

item.title: Dogs bring loads of joy but also perils on a leash
item.description: The cuddles. The loyalty. The worshipful eyes. There’s a lot of joy in having a dog, not the least of which is heading out for a brisk walk.

item.title: Young climate activists ask US Supreme Court to revive their lawsuit against the government
item.description: Young climate activists in Oregon are asking the U.S. Supreme Court to revive their long-running lawsuit against the federal government.
